newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan FGEP group buys 54,000T U.S. corn at tender.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan FGEP group buys 54,000T U.S. corn at tender.

text.p: Taiwan's FGEP corn buying group bought a 54,000-tonne shipment of U.S. No.2 corn from Japan's trading house Zennoh at a tender on Wednesday, traders said.
The FGEP group comprises Fwu Sow Grain, Great Wall Enterprise, President Enterprise, Ever Smile Feed Mill Co and Fong Yu.
The shipment was bought on a cost-and-freight basis.
Details for the tender are as follows:
27,000 September 1-15 September 16-30 80.00 US cents/Sep 27,000 September 1-15 September 16-30 $123.00
